description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 nonzero squares in exactly 3 ways.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
prog: (Haskell)a025286 n = a025286_list !! (n-1)a025286_list = filter ((== 3) . a025426) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 26 2015
